analysis: The documents all relate to adjustments in the rates of pay for various federal employees, including those in the General Schedule, Foreign Service, Veterans Health Administration, Senior Executive Service, Executive Schedule, Congress, the judiciary, uniformed services, and administrative law judges. They also address locality-based comparability payments and adjustments to basic allowances for subsistence and quarters for uniformed services. The orders specify effective dates for the pay adjustments and often supersede prior executive orders.
title: Federal Employee Compensation Adjustments
